text: Danilo Samaniego (born 22 December 1964) is retired football player from Ecuador, he played as a defender during his career. ==Career== Samaniego began his career with L.D.U. Quito in 1982, he also played for Deportivo Quito. ==Honours== * L.D.U. Quito ** Ecuadorian Serie A: 1990, 1998 ==References== ==External links== * Danilo Samaniego at National Football Teams Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:Ecuador international footballers Category:Ecuadorian Serie A players Category:L.D.U. Quito footballers Category:S.D. Quito footballers Category:Sportspeople from Quito Category:Association football defenders
title: Danilo Samaniego
